ComicInfo.Summary: Borders are setÂ between the aquatic Blue and the human race. Killian has heated up the playing field and started a war which he wont be able to contain. Tempting a very determined Admiral Maylander who's determination may just be the death of the Blue.Meanwhile Aspen Matthews discovers a key to her past that may change her entire opinionabout the war. When the war starts brewing up Aspen must make the terrible choice of where her loyalties lay. To her biological family or her adopted family.
